entries.meaning: (chiefly with definite article "the") A rough outline of a topic or situation.
examples: Could you give me the rundown on the new rules?

entries.meaning: (gambling) A summary of the horses to be raced on a particular day, with their weights, jockeys, odds, etc.
examples: Comes post-time, and I am at the bookie joint listening the running descriptions and rundowns,  [â€¦]

entries.meaning: (baseball) A defensive play in which the runner is caught between two fielders, who steadily converge to tag the runner out.
examples: Smith is caught in a rundown, but Jones will come around to score.

entries.meaning: A Caribbean stew of meat or fish (typically mackerel) with reduced coconut milk, yam, tomato, onion and seasonings.
A reduction, e.g. of an activity, or in the size of something, such as a fleet.
